titleStmt.title: Archerie reviv'd: a poetical essay, penn'd upon occasion of the intended muster of the Company of Archers in Scotland, June 11. 1677
titleStmt.author: W. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
